snippet: An imprint of Penguin Group USA discovered Kerry Schafer after she posted samples on Bookcountry.com, a site that lets writers share their work.
abstract: An imprint of Penguin Group USA discovered Kerry Schafer after she posted samples on Bookcountry.com, a site that lets writers share their work.
lead_paragraph: Penguin Group USA has plucked its first author from its new electronic slush pile.

headline.main: Discovered on Publisher's Web Site, Aspiring Author Signs Book Deal
